question.text: Which variables are significant in the model? We will consider a variable signficant only if the p-value is below 0.05. (Select all that apply.)
question.explanation: If you look at the model we created in the previous problem using summary(climatelm), all of the variables have at least one star except for CH4 and N2O. So MEI, CO2, CFC.11, CFC.12, TSI, and Aerosols are all significant.
